title: mail server domains
extract: Quick Email Settings for POP3 or IMAPIncoming Servermail.mydomain.com (replace mydomain.com with your own domain name)PasswordYour e-mail account passwordIncoming PortPOP3 995 or IMAP 993Outgoing Mail Server (SMTP) Port465SSLYES4 more rows•Aug 10, 2017

Quick Email Settings for POP3 or IMAP
